msg.msgText: Stop IBM MessageSight services. SYNTAX: imaserver stop help imaserver stop imaserver stop force imaserver stop forcemaintenance imaserver stop service_name imaserver stop service_name force EXAMPLES: imaserver stop mqconnectivity force NOTES: 1. By default "imaserver stop" command will stop "imaserver". 2. The valid options for "service_name" are "imaserver", "mqconnectivity", "webui", and "plugin". 3. "imaserver stop forcemaintenance" command will restart the IBM MessageSight server. When it is restarted, it will be in "maintenance" mode.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
